Options

Source: src/elements/options/options

Demonstration

Markup 

<!--{ @for       Should match the id of the input }-->
<!--{ @tabindex  Add tabindex="-1" to insure focusable elements are not visible when parent is hidden }-->
<label class="option " for="dc06051990de7">
  <!--{ @tabindex  Add tabindex="-1" to insure focusable elements are not visible when parent is hidden }-->
  <input id="dc06051990de7" name="option['dc06051990de7']" type="checkbox" value="checkbox" />
  <span class="option__base">
    <svg aria-hidden="true" class="option__graphic">
      <use xlink:href="#option-wnyc-checkbox"></use>
    </svg>
    <span class="option__label">Checkbox</span>
  </span>
</label>
